thread.section_title: Vision Direct UK Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of visiondirect.co.uk
thread.title: Stacy
thread.title_full: Vision Direct UK reviewed by Stacy

author: Stacy
title: Stacy
text:
Fabulous service. Amazing.
When I put in my order I didn't notice that the delivery address was my previous address... I noticed when the shipping confirmation came through (not the order confirmation, my fault) so I got in touch with the team.... I asked if I could have a refund IF the delivery was unsuccessful... Instead they went above and beyond and sent me another pack free of charge to the correct address.
I definitely was not expecting that as I was in the wrong, but it was such a lovely gesture. Thank you so much :)
When I do get the details correct, the service is great too. Everything arrives quickly and can be posted through my letterbox so I don't need to be in to sign for it. A loyal customer right here.
Thanks again
